subject: Why dumb is smart
body:
My "dumb idea" sold over 12 million copies of a single book and allowed me to start a world-famous training business. 

Now, I want to "take you by the hand" and show you how to turn your "dumb idea" into a business reality... and possibly... into a windfall fortune!

http://espreeturtle.com/t/qi3c6-j-h/238051
